Name: ViseLock S3 Tractor Beam
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Tractor Beam
Max Angle: 80°
Max Range: 135 m
Full Strength Distance: 50 m

The ViseLock tractor beam is an evolution of Greycat’s industry-standard tech, with added improvements specifically intended to help security forces restrain their targets. In its design, Greycat sacrificed some hold strength at greater distances to achieve a more powerful tether that is harder to escape.
